scripts.install: echo 'installing frontend deps' && cd apps/frontend && yarn install --frozen-lockfile && echo 'installing e2e deps' && cd ../../e2e && yarn install --frozen-lockfile
scripts.autofix: ultra -r autofix && cd apps/frontend && yarn autofix && cd ../../e2e && yarn autofix
scripts.link-libs: yarn prepare-link && cd apps/frontend && yarn link-libs
scripts.link-libs-int: yarn prepare-link && cd apps/frontend && yarn link-libs-int
scripts.prepare-link: cd packages/types && yarn link && cd ../client && yarn link && cd ../../node_modules/@effect-ts/core && yarn link && cd ../system && yarn link && cd ../monocle && yarn link && cd ../morphic && yarn link && cd ../schema && yarn link && cd ../tracing-plugin && yarn link && cd ../../@effect-ts-app/core && yarn link && cd ../fluent && yarn link
scripts.prepare-unlink: cd packages/types && yarn unlink && cd ../client && yarn unlink && cd ../../node_modules/@effect-ts/core && yarn unlink && cd ../system && yarn unlink && cd ../monocle && yarn unlink && cd ../morphic && yarn unlink && cd ../schema && yarn unlink && cd ../tracing-plugin && yarn unlink && cd ../../@effect-ts-app/core && yarn unlink && cd ../fluent && yarn unlink
scripts.dev:linked: echo 'running in linked mode, make sure you ran `link-libs` before' && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "API,Frontend" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "yarn dev:api" "yarn dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:unlinked: echo 'running in unlinked mode, make sure you ran `unlink-libs` before' && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "API,Frontend" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold,blue.bold" "yarn dev:api" "yarn dev:frontend"
scripts.build-apps: cd apps/api && yarn build && cd ../frontend && yarn build
scripts.up: yarn update && yarn exec-update && yarn link-libs-int
scripts.update: ultra -r --root ncu -u --packageFile package.json && cd apps/frontend && yarn update && cd ../../e2e && yarn update
scripts.exec-update: yarn && yarn upgrade && cd apps/frontend && yarn exec-update && cd ../../e2e && yarn exec-update
scripts.pub: yarn pub:libs && cd apps/api && yarn update-libs && yarn && git add package.json && cd ../../ && yarn && cd apps/frontend && yarn update-libs && yarn && git add package.json yarn.lock
scripts.build-libs: cd packages/types && yarn build && cd ../client && yarn build
scripts.testsuite-libs: cd packages/types && yarn testsuite && cd ../client && yarn testsuite
